title: pixel 3 unlocked and stuck in fastboot, how can i get it back to anything?? please help
content: i added magisk had it rooted and all was good...then i started adding mods , one after another and then reboot.  i had company and was busy but it let me in recovery and i dont recall but its now stuck in the fastboot and wont let me in anything.   ive tried letting power run down and all the buttons and combination of buttons.  adb wont recognize it but fastboot devices i get the serial number...its been weeks and i still owe over 300 on the phone which is a few months old..the phone is unlocked..thats the only difference from the others on here so its why im asking for your help.. thought ive read somewhere that it can be fix 99% chance anyways if it still shows unlocked..please help ive had to pause my service go to my old carrier and hook my iphone back up...its been terrible
